update.description:
The reason this is on ode_physics_params_irr_debug branch is because it has a test (`physics_basic_controller_response.cc`) that exercises this patch.

`494_joint_axis_frame.cc` needs additional functionalities that're currently not working with Simbody yet, e.g. dynamically `SetAxis` or `SetAnchor` on a joint.
update.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)
update.reason: We cannot have pull-request that merge into a non-default branch.

pull_request.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

update.description:
The reason this is on ode_physics_params_irr_debug branch is because it has a test (`physics_basic_controller_response.cc`) that exercises this patch.

`494_joint_axis_frame.cc` needs additional functionalities that're currently not working with Simbody yet, e.g. dynamically `SetAxis` or `SetAnchor` on a joint.

content.raw:
`494_joint_axis_frame.cc` is failing with following errors:
~~~
$ ../build_release/test/regression/REGRESSION_494_joint_axis_frame --gtest_filter="*/2"
~~~
~~~
[Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.1 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
[Dbg] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:82] SpawnJoint revolute child parent
[Dbg] [SimbodyHingeJoint.cc:178] GetAngleImpl() simbody not yet initialized, initial angle should be zero until <initial_angle> is implemented.
[Err] [SimbodyJoint.cc:386] SimbodyJoint::SetAnchor:  Not implement in Simbody. Anchor is set during joint construction in SimbodyPhysics.cc
[Dbg] [SimbodyHingeJoint.cc:55] SetAxis: setting axis is not yet implemented.  The axis are set  during joint construction in SimbodyPhysics.cc for now.
[Err] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:118] not worldParent
[Dbg] [SimbodyHingeJoint.cc:142] GetGlobalAxis() sibmody physics engine not initialized yet, use local axis and initial pose to compute global axis.
[Err] [494_joint_axis_frame.cc:216] joint t [1] v [1] a [0.965926 0.258819 0] c [0.866026 0.499999 0] p [0 0 0]
/home/hsu/projects/gazebo_default_20/test/regression/494_joint_axis_frame.cc:223: Failure
The difference between vel and _axis.Dot(childVelocity - parentVelocity) is 0.034073972971610633, which exceeds g_tolerance, where
vel evaluates to 1,
_axis.Dot(childVelocity - parentVelocity) evaluates to 0.96592602702838937, and
g_tolerance evaluates to 0.0001.

pull_request.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

pullrequest.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

content.raw: It would be helpful to have more than the issue number in the pull request title. There's currently 3 pull requests with just issue numbers in the title, and it's hard for me to remember which is which.
content.html: It would be helpful to have more than the issue number in the pull request title. There's currently 3 pull requests with just issue numbers in the title, and it's hard for me to remember which is which.

pull_request.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

pullrequest.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

content.raw: with this patch, sandia hand simulation with simbody in drcsim is behaving correctly (see [issue 410](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/issue/410/sandia-hand-model-in-simbody-does-not)).
content.html: with this patch, sandia hand simulation with simbody in drcsim is behaving correctly (see issue 410).

pull_request.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

pullrequest.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

content.raw: If you're adding a function to Joint.hh, this will have to go to default, not 3.0, unless you can preserve ABI.
content.html: If you're adding a function to Joint.hh, this will have to go to default, not 3.0, unless you can preserve ABI.

pull_request.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

pullrequest.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

content.raw: The axis frame should be expressed in the joint frame (defined by `<joint><pose>` offset from child link frame, which is stored in `this->anchorPose` (see Joint::GetWorldPose)).
content.html: The axis frame should be expressed in the joint frame (defined by <joint><pose> offset from child link frame, which is stored in this->anchorPose (see Joint::GetWorldPose)).

pull_request.title: fix dart and simbody joint axis interpretation incorrect (#1143)

update.description:
The reason this is on ode_physics_params_irr_debug branch is because it has a test (`physics_basic_controller_response.cc`) that exercises this patch.

`494_joint_axis_frame.cc` needs additional functionalities that're currently not working with Simbody yet, e.g. dynamically `SetAxis` or `SetAnchor` on a joint.
update.title: fix issue #1143
